com.qtplaf.library.swing.core

Class JOptionFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • com.qtplaf.library.swing.core.JFrameSession
                • com.qtplaf.library.swing.core.JOptionFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class JOptionFrame
extends JFrameSession
    An option frame in the fashion of the JOptionPane, more friendly and under the total control of this library.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • addAction

        public void addAction(javax.swing.Action action)
        Add an action that is expected to have a name or source name at least. It can also have the common attributes, short description, accelerator key, action group.

        This option frame is set as the user object, so it can be retrieved when the action is executed.

        Parameters:
        action - The action. One of them should be the default close action.
